text:
三、判令被告深圳多用途进出口有限公司应于本判决生
效之日起十日内向原告四季纸业有限公司（Four Seasons
Paper LLC）支付资金占用损失（89042美元按2022年8月
3日汇率折合人民币后共计人民币657585.51元，以人民币
657585.51元为基数，自2022年8月3日起按照中国人民银
行授权全国银行间同业拆借中心公布的一年期贷款市场报
价利率的标准，计算至实际付清之日止）；
trans:
3. The defendant, Shenzhen Multipurpose Import and Export Co., Ltd., is hereby ordered to
the plaintiff, Four Seasons Paper LLC, compensation for capital occupancy losses within ten days of this judgment taking effect.
The amount is $89,042, converted to RMB657,585.51
based on the exchange rate as of August 3, 2022.
Interest on this amount, calculated from August 3, 2022,
shall be based on the one-year loan prime rate published by the National Interbank Funding Center authorized by the People’s Bank of China
and shall accrue until the payment is fully settled;
